record.field: 1. Which of the following activities constitute HRM?
C. All i, ii, and iii

2. Referring the career development cycle, which stage begins when a new employee joins an organization and finds a big gap to exist between what the organization is and what the ideal organization should actually be?
3. Which of the following phases involves generating confidence in the employee to open up and frankly share their perceptions, feeling etc.?
4. Which of the following expands the number of related tasks in the job?
B. Part time job during off hours
C. Flexi time in one quarter of year
6. What is an organized group of employees who come together to strengthen their bargaining position called as?
7. Which of the following is covered under the development function of HRM?
D. All i, ii and iii
8. Performance appraisal helps in identifying the ______.
9. Sensitivity training in _________ is a method of changing behavior through group processes.
10. Which of the following are contained in the sections of Job Description?

field.name: description
field.p: iv] Requirement in terms of skills, responsibilities etc

record.field: 11. TQM believes that quality reduces cost through reduced wastage, greater productivity and _______.
12. Why is training and development important in organizations?

field.name: description
field.p: iii] It helps in facing the tough competition;
iv] It helps the company fulfil financial needs

record.field: C. All i, ii and iii
D. All i, ii and iv
13. What do the following characteristics in an individual indicate?

field.name: description
field.p: i] Ability to take considerable responsibility;
ii] Ability to influence and control others;

record.field: 14. _______ is a methodology to evaluate various elements of HRD.
15. Lay off is temporary dismissal of surplus staff for a maximum of ________ days due to shortage of coal, power etc.
16. For which kind of jobs is On-the-job training useful?

field.name: description
field.p: i] Jobs which are difficult to simulate;
ii] Jobs which can be learned quickly by watching and doing;

record.field: 17. If jobs with same or similar responsibilities are not placed on the same grade & salary scale. What is needed to be done?
18. The organization prefers people who look for _________ with the company.
19. 360 - Degree Appraisal helps in getting a broad assessment of an individual from various sources. Which of the following factors need to be watched here?
C. All i, ii and iii
20. Training and Development managers are also called as _______.
21. Under training and development plan, the form is to be prepared in ________ form.
22. ______ is the simple act of comparison & learning for organisational improvement
23. The Job Characteristics Model is one of the most influential attempts to________.
A. Design jobs with increased motivational properties
B. Assign jobs with proper motivational properties
C. Analyse jobs with increase and proper motivation
D. Describe jobs with increase motivation for proper jobs
24. Treating employees as precious human resources is the basis of the ________approach.
25. The business side of the process begins with the strategic _____ as the guiding framework.
26. Competitive edge comes from the ________ of people.
27. Individual level where people are usually motivated to close the gap between their current and desired ______.
28. HR professional should apply risk management techniques to the different aspects of ______.
29. Developing characteristics of people needed to run business in ________ .
A. Retirement and separation of employees
